title: The Favorites - AFC East Betting Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - AFC East Betting Preview
description:
The Super Bowl favorite Buffalo Bills are atop the preseason AFC East odds board, and today's guest Tim Graham is no stranger to life in Buffalo. He's a senior writer for The Athletic, with a decades-long journalism resume that includes stints at ESPN, the Palm Springs Post and the Buffalo News, which has made him one of the most connected, pragmatic and well-respected voices not only in the annals of Western NY sports media but across the entire AFC East. 

Together with our Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter, the trio discusses the Patriots and Dolphins attempt to dethrone the Bills, the Jets quest towards relevance, and so much more. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
